name: Ensicord add-ons
description: Does nothing, but probably helps you test add-ons

name: Save Ensi
description: Sets Ensi's name to the default one

name: Set theme to system
description: Makes Ensicord follow your system theme

name: Set theme to light
description: Sets Ensicord theme to light, i dont think you'd like to apply this

name: Set theme to dark
description: Sets Ensicord theme to dark, best add-on
